The Africa Journal of Evangelical Theology bụ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ nke Mahadum Scott Christian bipụtara na Kenya
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka isi nzukọ maka ntụgharị uche nke ozioma na nkà mmụta okpukpe Africa
E bipụtara AJET na 1982 dị ka East Africa Journal of Evangelical Theology
Ọ nakweere aha ya ugbu a na 1990
Africa Justice Foundation (AJF) bụ ọrụ ebere edebanyere aha na UK nke ndị ọkàiwu atọ nke Britain, Cherie Booth KC, Philip Riches KC na Suella Braverman (née Fernandes) guzobere na 2010
AJF rụrụ ọrụ iji wuo usoro iwu siri ike, kwụsiri ike, na nke a na-ahụ anya gafee mpaghara Sahara Africa na ọrụ na Ethiopia, Rwanda, Tanzania na Kenya
Booth ekwuola na usoro iwu siri ike ma bụrụ nke a pụrụ ịdabere na ya dị oke mkpa maka akụ na ụba na-apụta iji nwee ọganihu n'ụzọ akụ na ụba, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ihe omume AJF lekwasịrị anya na ogidi anọ ịkwalite ohere ịnweta ozi iwu; inye ohere ikpe ziri ezi; imeziwanye ogo iwu; na ọzụzụ na nkà iwu azụmahịa, gafee kọntinent ahụ
Na mbido akụkọ ihe mere eme ya, AJF nyere onyinye agụmakwụkwọ maka ihe karịrị ndị omeiwu iri abụọ si Sierra Leone, Ghana, Ethiopia na Rwanda
AJF kwadoro maka ọrụ maka Iwu Iwu na atụmatụ mmepe post-2015, ma rịọ Onye isi oche nke Nzukọ Ezumezu nke Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu maka okwu a yana ndị ọka iwu maka mmepe mba ụwa
Nzọụkwụ a kwadoro site na Business Council for Africa, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Africa Justice Foundation kwụsịrị ọrụ ya na June 2018
Braverman gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye nduzi nke ọrụ ebere na 2015, obere oge ka a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu Conservative Member of Parliament maka Fareham
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ụlọ n'afọ 2022 n'okpuru Praịm Minista Liz Truss
O kwuru n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2022 na ọ ga-amasị ya ịhụ ihu akwụkwọ nke The Daily Telegraph na-eziga ndị na-achọ ebe mgbaba na Rwanda, ma kọwaa ya dị ka ' nrọ' na 'nchegbu' ya
O kwuru na ya ekwupụtaghị njikọ ya na Africa Justice Foundation na ọrụ ya na-azụ ndị ọka iwu gọọmentị Rwanda n'ihi na ọ dịghị mkpa
Ọtụtụ ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Africa Justice Foundation nwere ọkwa dị elu na gọọmentị Rwanda ugbu a
Africa Magic bụ mkpokọta ọwa ntụrụndụ Pay TV na-elekwasị anya na mmemme Africa, usoro na ihe nkiri Naijiria kacha ewu ewu
Africa Magic, nke malitere dị ka otu ọwa nke otu aha, bụ akara nke M-Net nwere ma ugbu a ọ nwere ọwa asaa
Africa Magic malitere dị ka otu ọwa Nollywood nke nwetara ewu ewu site na nnukwu ndị na-enweta ego nke Multichoice , South Africa na Nigeria, bu ihe kpatara eji malite Africa Magic plus
Emechara degharịa aha ndị a yana imepụta ọwa ọhụrụ
N'afọ 2017, Africa Magic World kwụsịrị n'ihi enweghị onye na-ekiri ya
Na mbụ Africa Magic Plus wee bụbụ Africa Magic Entertainment
Ọwa ọkwa ọkwa na-egosi usoro izizi izizi, ihe ngosi eziokwu na ihe ngosi ihe nkiri nollywood ndi kachasị ọhụrụ
Ọwa ntụrụndụ na ụdị ihe nkiri na ihe ngosi okwu, yana usoro sitere na Mzansi Magic
Ọwa sitere na mgbọrọgwụ ọdịnala Africa nwere ihe nkiri na usoro na-egosi akụkụ omenala
Ọwa nne na nna Africa Magic na-eje ozi mmemme gbasara ezinụlọ
Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Awards ( AMVCA ) bụ nkwanye ugwu nke MultiChoice na- egosi kwa afọ na-amata mmezu pụtara ìhè na telivishọn na ihe nkiri
Emere emume mmeghe nke Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Awards na Lagos, Lagos State na Nigeria na 9 Maachị 2013, ma gbasa ozi ya ozugbo na mba iri ise
Ihe ndenye na emume nturu ugo bụ ihe nkiri na ihe onyonyo ewepụtara n'afọ gara aga
Ndị a bụ udi ihe nrite nke 2018
10 na elu

Africa Fighting Malaria (AFM) bụ otu NGO nke dị na Washington DC, United States na South Africa nke kwuru na ọ 'na-achọ ịkụziri ndị mmadụ banyere ihe otiti nke ịba na akụ na ụba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ịchịkwa ịba'
Nzukọ ahụ n'ozuzu ya 'na-akwalite ngwọta ahịa na nnwere onwe akụ na ụba dị ka ụzọ kachasị mma iji hụ na ọdịmma ka mma na ogologo oge ndụ na mba ndị dara ogbenye', dịka nkwupụta ego ha si kwuo
Tọrọ ntọala na 2000 n'oge Stockholm Negotiations on Persistent Organic Pollutants, ihe mbụ AFM lekwasịrị anya bụ ịkwalite nnwere onwe ahụike ọha na eze maka ọgwụ ahụhụ DDT maka ịchịkwa ịba

Dị ka ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ha si kwuo, nke ikpeazụ e mezigharịrị na 2011, ebumnuche ha bụ 'ime ka nchịkwa ịba doo anya, na-emeghachi omume ma dị irè site n'ime ka ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze na-aza ajụjụ maka ego na itinye n'ọrụ iwu nchịkwa ịnyịnya dị irè, jikọtara ọnụ na nke mba na-eduzi'
Dị ka akwụkwọ IRS si kwuo, nzukọ ahụ mefuru ego kpamkpam na nkwụghachi ụgwọ ndị isi, na-enweghị mmefu mmemme ọ bụla
A kọwawo ya dị ka otu ndị na-eme ihe n'ihu nke e guzobere iji mebie ndị na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi

N'akwụkwọ ndị e nwetara n'oge ikpe steeti megide ụlọ ọrụ ụtaba, onye guzobere Roger Bate kọwara ebumnuche nzukọ ahụ dị ka akụkụ nke atụmatụ ka ukwuu iji gosipụta ndị na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi n'ụwa mbụ dị ka ndị na-enweghị nchegbu maka ndị isi ojii Africa
Àtụ Malaria
Africa Check bụ òtù na-enweghị uru nke na-enyocha eziokwu nke e guzobere na 2012 iji kwalite izi ezi na arụmụka ọha na eze na mgbasa ozi na Africa
Ebumnuche nke nzukọ ahụ bụ ịkwalite ogo nke ozi ọha na eze nwere na kọntinent ahụ

Africa Check bụ òtù nwere onwe ya nwere ọfịs na Johannesburg, Nairobi, Lagos, Dakar na London, na-emepụta akụkọ na Bekee na French nyocha nke ndị mmadụ, ụlọ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi mere megide ihe akaebe kachasị mma dịnụ
Africa Check bụ nke Peter Cunliffe-Jones malitere mgbe ọ meriri asọmpi akụkọ ọhụrụ nke International Press Institute nke Google kwadoro
E mere ya dịka FactCheckorg na PolitiFactcom ma bụrụ ebe nrụọrụ weebụ mbụ na South Africa iji lekwasị anya naanị na nyocha eziokwu
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2015, Africa Check guzobere otu nyocha eziokwu nke dị na ụlọ akwụkwọ EJICOM nke akụkọ na Dakar, Senegal
Ndị otu Dakar na-arụ ọrụ na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ asụsụ French nke Africa Check
Africa Check emeghewokwa ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara na Lagos, Nigeria (na 2016) na Nairobi, Kenya (na 2017) ma ugbu a na-ewe ihe dị ka ndị nyocha eziokwu 30
Na Machị 2019, a họpụtara Noko Makgato dị ka onye nduzi ọhụrụ nke Africa Check

N'otu ọnwa ahụ, Peter Cunliffe-Jones, onye guzobere Africa Check n'afọ 2012, kwupụtara na ọ ga-agba arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa ya dị ka onye isi nchịkwa site na Mee 2019 dịka a họpụtara ya dị ka nnukwu onye ndụmọdụ nke International Fact-Checking Network
Na June 2019, nzukọ nke abụọ nke Africa Fact, nke Africa Check kwadoro, nwere ihe dị ka mmadụ 30 sitere na mba asaa nke Afrịka, ndị nwere ahụmịhe kachasị mma
N'oge nzukọ nke isii nke Global Fact-Checking Summit, ha chịkọtara ozi gbasara ọnọdụ na mmepe nke ụlọ ọrụ nyocha eziokwu

Na Machị 2021, Africa Check, dị ka naanị nzukọ Afrịka, nyere ego site na Google News Initiative's (GNI) $ 3 nde GNI Vaccine Counter-Misinformation Open Fund, iji kwado ha n'ịkpọlite akụkọ ụgha nke ọgwụ mgbochi COVID-19
A maara Africa Check maka ọrụ ya na nyocha eziokwu nke nkwupụta nje virus mere banyere South Africa na Facebook, dịka nkwupụta na 2013 na South Africa 'dị njọ ugbu a karịa afọ 19 gara aga'

A nyochara nkwupụta iri na isii banyere South Africa gụnyere nkwupụta dịka 'enweghị ọrụ na South Africa ejirila ihe karịrị pasent 60 rịa elu n'ime afọ iri na itoolu gara aga', South Africa nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị elu nke ndina n'ike n'ụwa, South Africa bụkwa otu n'ime mba iri kachasị elu n'ụwa maka igbu ọchụ
Banyere nkwupụta ndị a, Africa Check chọpụtara na ọnụ ọgụgụ enweghị ọrụ nke South Africa amụbaala site na 20% ruo 247% n'ime afọ 19 gara aga, mmụba nke 235%, yabụ nkwupụta nke mmụba 60% bụ ụgha

Ha enweghị ike ịkwado nkwupụta ahụ na South Africa nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị elu nke ndina n'ike n'ụwa, mana ha kọrọ na ọ ga-abụ eziokwu na South Africa nọ na mba iri kachasị elu maka ọnụ ọgụgụ igbu ọchụ kachasị elu
Africa Check agbaghaala nkwupụta nke 'ọgwụgwọ ahịhịa' maka HIV / AIDS nke gbasara n'Africa, na-ekwu na ọ nweghị ihe akaebe maka ịdị irè nke ọgwụ ọ bụla a na-ekwu

Na South Africa, enwere arụmụka ụfọdụ banyere ma mwakpo ugbo South Africa ọ bụ mgbukpọ agbụrụ a haziri ahazi megide ndị ọrụ ugbo South African ma ọ bụ ma ọnụọgụ mwakpo na igbu ọchụ kwekọrọ na ọnụọgụ igbu ọchukwu n'ozuzu South Africa

Africa Check kọrọ na ọnụọgụ igbu ọchụ nke ndị ọcha ugbu a dị ala karịa ọnụọgụ ogbugbu nke agbụrụ ndị ọzọ na South Africa nakwa na ọ dị ala karịa ọnụ ọgụgụ igbu ọchukwu maka ndị ọcha site na 1979 ruo 1991, nke bụ n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ma na-etinye ajụjụ banyere nkwupụta nke mgbukpọ agbụrụ
Malite na World Health Organization (WHO) na 2008, nkwupụta ahụ bụ na 80% nke ndị South Africa na-eji ndị na-agwọ ọrịa ọdịnala agbasawo site na mgbasa ozi n'ụwa niile
Africa Check chọpụtara na nkwupụta a gabigara oke ókè nakwa na nkwupụta ahụ nwere ike ịchọta na nkwupụta na-enweghị ihe akaebe nke e mere na akwụkwọ WHO nke 1983
Africa Check ekwenyewo n'echiche nke na-azọrọ na ebe ụfọdụ bụ 'isi obodo ndina n'ike nke ụwa'

Dị ka Africa Check si kwuo, ọ gaghị ekwe omume iji ya tụnyere n'ihi na mba dị iche iche nwere nkọwa iwu dị iche iche nke ndina n'ike, ụzọ isi chịkọta data nke ndina n'ike, na ọkwa nke ịkọ akụkọ ndina n'obi
Nsogbu ndị a niile na-eme ka ntụnyere ziri ezi nke ọnụọgụ ndina n'ike gafee mba ndị ọzọ ghara ikwe omume, n'ihi na data ahụ bụ ihe a na-apụghị ịdabere na ya ugbu a
O nwekwara ikpo okwu raara onwe ya nye - InfoFinder - nke nwere isi mmalite ozi a pụrụ ịdabere na ya site na mba Afrịka dị iche iche

N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2018, Facebook kwupụtara ebumnuche ya iso Africa Check na ndị ọzọ na-enyocha eziokwu na Kenya, yana enyemaka nke ndị ọrụ, iji gosipụta akụkọ akụkọ ụgha na mgbalị imeziwanye ogo akụkọ ndị mmadụ na-ahụ na ikpo okwu ya
A ga-emecha gbasaa ya na steeti ndị ọzọ dị n'Afrịka
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, Facebook malitekwara inye ngwá ọrụ nyocha eziokwu iji belata akụkọ ụgha na Naịjirịa
Na Machị 2019, Africa Check, na mmekorita ya na NPO Volume Investigations, webatara ọrụ 'Gịnị bụ ihe na-enweghị isi na WhatsApp?' iji chọpụta akụkọ ụgha n'ụzọ dị mfe
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2019, a mara ọkwa na Facebook, na mmekorita ya na Africa Check, ga-ewebata asụsụ mpaghara ọhụrụ maka ọtụtụ asụsụ Afrịka
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, Africa Check, ya na ụlọ ọrụ podcast Volume, hụrụ uto dị egwu na podcast WhatsApp ya na-ekpughe ozi ụgha a na-ekesa n'ọtụtụ ebe ma nwee ike ịgbasa ndị na-akwado ya n'oge ọrịa COVID-19

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2018 Africa Check kọrọ banyere ụmụ nwanyị nọ na South Africa na-eme ngagharị iwe megide ime ihe ike na igbu ọchụ ụmụ nwanyị ka ọ pụtara na ọnụ ọgụgụ igbu ọchukwu ụmụ nwanyị ji okpukpu anọ karịa na South Africa dị ka ọ dị n'ụwa ndị ọzọ

Na Jenụwarị 2019 Africa Check kọrọ na ndị uwe ojii South Africa edekọla ndina n'ike 40,035 n'ime ọnwa iri na abụọ ruo na Machị 31, 2018, nke mere ka Cyril Ramaphosa nke South Africa kpọọ oku maka ime ihe megide 'nsogbu ndina n'ọchịchị'

N'afọ 2018, Africa Check kpọrọ mbọ enyemaka nke Australia iji nyere ndị ọrụ ugbo South Africa aka site n'ịgbaso ngwa ngwa akwụkwọ ha maka visa ma kọọkwa ọzọ na ọ 'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe na-agaghị ekwe omume' iji gbakọọ ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ogbugbu ugbo na South Africa n'ụzọ ziri ezi mana ọnụ ọgụgụ ọhụrụ na nke a pụrụ ịdabere na ya gosipụtara na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke igbu ọchụ ugbo niile nwere ike ịbụ naanị 04 maka 100,000 mmadụ
Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ụlọ, ọpụpụ na nchekwa ókèala n'Australia Peter Dutton dabere na akụkọ ụgha na ogbugbu nke ndị ọrụ ugbo South Africa na-eme kwa izu

N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2020, Africa Check kpughere akụkọ ụgha nke onye bụbu onye isi obodo Joburg bụ Herman Mashaba wepụtara, onye kwuru na tweet na e nwere nde mmadụ iri na ise 'ndị mba ọzọ na-enweghị akwụkwọ' bi na South Africa na ndị ji obi ụtọ kọwaa ozi ziri ezi nke ndị ọzọ a ma ama bipụtara
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2021, Africa Check kwupụtara na ọnụ ọgụgụ nde iri na ise rịrị elu nke ukwuu
Africa Check anọwo na-agba ọsọ nke mbụ African Fact-checking Awards na kọntinent ahụ
N'afọ mbụ ha, 2014, ndị nta akụkọ abụọ si Ghana meriri ihe nrite ahụ, ndị nke abụọ si Kenya na Zambia
N'afọ 2015, onye mmeri si Naijiria na onye nke abụọ si South Africa
N'afọ 2016, Africa Check mepụtara ụdị onyinye maka akụkọ e bipụtara na mgbasa ozi Francophone
N'afọ ahụ, ndị nta akụkọ si Cameroon na Côte d'Ivoire meriri ihe nrite ahụ, na ndị nke abụọ si Naịjirịa na Swaziland
N'afọ 2017, Africa Check gbakwunyere otu ụmụ akwụkwọ, dịka nyocha eziokwu na-aga n'ihu ịghọ nkà dị mkpa
Nke a hụrụ Moussa Ngom nke CESTI na Senegal ka ọ bụrụ nwa akwụkwọ akụkọ Afrịka mbụ na-asụ French iji merie akụkọ nyocha kachasị mma site n'aka onye nta akụkọ ụmụ akwụkwọ

Banathi Mgqoboka nke Rhodes University's School of Journalism and Media Studies na South Africa ghọrọ nwa akwụkwọ akụkọ Africa mbụ na-asụ Bekee ka edepụtara maka akụkọ nyocha kachasị mma site n'aka nwa akwụkwọ akụkọ mgbe ọ na-aga Mahadum Teknụzụ nke Cape Peninsula na 2017
Africa Check na-enyekwa ihe nrite nyocha eziokwu kwa afọ na ngalaba ndị nta akụkọ na-arụ ọrụ
N'afọ 2019, e nyere onye nta akụkọ Naijiria bụ Odinaka Anudu nke Business Day Nigeria ihe nrite a, na 2020, ọ gara onye nta akụkọ naijiria bụ Taiwo Adebulu nke akwụkwọ akụkọ TheCable
Chọpụta kpọmkwem nkwupụta a ga-enyocha
Kpọtụrụ onye na-azọrọ na ọ ga-ajụ ha maka isi iyi ma ọ bụ ihe akaebe nke nkwupụta ha
Mgbe ahụ, ndị na-enyocha eziokwu ga-agakwuru ndị ọkachamara n'ọhịa iji gbakwunye nuance na ihe gbara ya gburugburu
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ndị na-ede akwụkwọ na-ede akụkọ ha, na-edepụta ihe akaebe nzọụkwụ site na nzọụkwụ ma na-egosi isi mmalite eji
A na-enyefe ihe odide ahụ na onye nchịkọta akụkọ maka nyocha
Naanị otu ugboro ka e kwekọrịtara na mkpebi ikpe, ka a na-ebipụta isiokwu ahụ

N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2020, ụlọ ọrụ atọ na-enyocha eziokwu Africa Check, Chequeado na Full Fact malitere ịchọpụta nsonaazụ nyocha dị ugbu a na 'nnyocha eziokwu' na ebumnuche iji kwado ndị na-enyochọpụta eziokwu n'ụwa niile iji hụ otu ha ga-esi nwee ike isi gbochie ozi na-ezighi ezi kamakwa inye aka 'mepụta usoro ozi dị mma n'ime ogologo oge' na iji mee ka ọha na eze mara nkwupụta a ga-enyocha nke ọma ma bụrụ ndị ọzọ na ihe ha gụrụ
Africa Check debanyere aha dị ka ntụkwasị obi na-enweghị uru na South Africa na dị ka ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọdịmma obodo na Britain
E guzobere Africa Check site na onyinye mbụ £ 45,648 na 2012
Ụlọ ọrụ Agence France-Presse (AFP), na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand nyere ego
N'afọ 2016, ọ nwetara obere ihe n'okpuru £ 473,000

N'afọ 2016, ndị isi na-enye onyinye nke Africa Check bụ Shuttleworth Foundation (26% nke ego ha na-enweta), Omidyar Network (23%), Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation (13%), Open Society Foundation for South Africa (OSF-SA) (12%), na Millennium Trust (9%), na Agence France-Presse (5%)
N'afọ 2016, Africa Check nwetara ihe dị ka 6% nke ego ọ na-enweta site na TRI Facts, ngalaba ọzụzụ azụmahịa ya, nyocha na ozi, nke na-enye ọrụ azụmahịa
Ndị ọzọ na-enweghị uru na-eme obere pasent nke ego a na-enweta, ihe dị ka 1% nke ego a ga-enweta na-esite n'aka ndị na-enye onyinye
Africa Online Holding Ltd, mgbe ụfọdụ abbreviated ka AFOL, bụ nnukwu onye na-enye ọrụ ịntanetị (ISP) na Africa
Dabere na Nairobi, Kenya, ọ na-enye ohere ịntanetị ma na-arụ ọrụ na mba Africa iri, gụnyere Cote d'Ivoire, Ghana, Namibia, Eswatini, Tanzania, Uganda na Zimbabwe
Ọrụ Africa Online na-enye gụnyere ịnweta ịntanetị ịkpọ oku, ọrụ ahịrị mgbazinye, akaụntụ email, njikọ VSAT, DSL, WAN na VPN maka ndị ahịa onwe na ndị ahịa
Na 2007 ọ ghọrọ onye enyemaka nke Telkom South Africa
Ọ bụ Ayisi Makatiani, Karanja Gakio na Amolo Ng'weno, ndị Kenya atọ zutere ibe ha mgbe ha bụ ụmụ akwụkwọ na Cambridge, Massachusetts, malitere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1994
Makatiani na Gakio nọ na MIT mgbe Ng'weno nọ na Harvard
Echiche bụ isi maka ọrụ akụkọ n'ịntanetị maka ndị Kenya sitere na obodo dị n'ịnta na MIT nke a na-akpọ KenyaNet

KenyaNet bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ obodo ịntanetị na-elekwasị anya n'Africa (ndị ọzọ bụ Okyeame na Ghana, Naijanet na Nigeria, na Salonet na Sierra Leone) nke ụmụ akwụkwọ MIT guzobere ma na-achịkwa ma na-akwado na sava MIT
Site na mgbasa ozi ịntanetị, Africa Online wepụrụ uche ya n'inye ozi na ijikọ ndị Africa nọ na kọntinent ahụ na ịntanetị
Na 1995, International Wireless nke Boston zụtara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, nke mechara bụrụ Prodigy

N'ime oge a, Africa Online malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye Kenya mbụ ISP, ma mesịa gbasaa na Cote d'Ivoire (1995) ruo Ghana, Tanzania, Uganda, Zambia, Zimbabwe na Swaziland, na ndị Kenya atọ ahụ gara n'ihu na-ejikwa ọrụ ahụ
Na usoro a, Africa Online nwetara ọtụtụ ISP, dị ka Pipex Internet Solution (Swaziland), Net2000 (Kenya), UUNET (Namibia) na Swift Global (Uganda)
Na 1998, Prodigy rere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'aka African Lakes Corporation
Edeberela ọdọ mmiri Africa na London Stock Exchange kemgbe 1877 ma na-apụ ugbu a site na ọdịnala ọdịnala ya na ọrụ ugbo na Ngwuputa
Ruo oge ụfọdụ, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere mmasị na ndị na-etinye ego, na-edepụta na Nairobi Stock Exchange na 2001, mana ngwaahịa ya mechara tufuo ya ma wepụrụ ya na London na Nairobi na 2003
N'oge ahụ, ndị 3 malitere ahapụla Africa Online
Africa Online bụ nke Telkom South Africa zụrụ n'afọ 2007
Àtụ Infobox film
Africa Paradis bụ ihe nkiri akụkọ ifo nke afọ 2006 nke onye Benin na-eme ihe nkiri Sylvestre Amoussou dere ma duzie
E mepụtara ya na France na Benin ma bu n'uche ikwu okwu banyere ọnọdụ ndị Africa gbara ọsọ ndụ na Europe
N'afọ 2033, United States of Africa bụ mba na-eme nke ọma ma baa ọgaranya nke dị n'Africa
N'otu oge ahụ, Europe na-alụ ọgụ na nsogbu akụ na ụba na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ịda ogbenye na enweghị mmepe
Olivier bụ onye sayensị kọmputa nke bi na France na Pauline, onye nkuzi
Ha abụọ enweghị ọrụ na atụmanya ole na ole n'ihi akụ na ụba ọjọọ nke Europe
Di na nwunye ahụ na-enweghị olileanya kpebiri ịkwaga Africa na olile anya ịchọta ndụ ka mma, ọbụlagodi na ha maara na ha ga-eche ịkpa ókè megide Europe ihu n'Africa
Mgbe ha rutere n'Africa, a jụrụ visa Olivier na Pauline
Di na nwunye ahụ na-anwa ịgafe ókèala n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị zoro n'ụgbọala ndị na-ebubata ihe, mana ndị uwe ojii na-ahụ maka ókèala kwụsịrị ha ma jide ha ruo mgbe a ga-achụpụ ha na France
Olivier jisiri ike gbapụ, otu ìgwè ndị ọcha Africa dara ogbenye bi na ụlọ ọrụ kpọbatara ya
O mechara zuo njirimara nke nwoke ọcha nwụrụ anwụ ka o wee nwee akwụkwọ ọrụ

Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Pauline na-enweta ọrụ dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ nye Modibo Koudossou, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-akwado iwu mgbanwe mgbanwe nke ndị na-ese okwu iji dozie idei mmiri nke ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na Europe
N'elu ihe omuma ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke gụnyere mgbalị igbu ọchụ site n'aka ndị mmegide ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị rụrụ arụ, Pauline na Modibo na-adọrọ mmasị n'ebe ibe ha nọ
N'ikpeazụ, e jidere Olivier ma chee nchụpụ gaa Europe ihu, na-amanye Pauline ịhọrọ n'etiti ndị ikom abụọ ahụ na ndụ ya

Na The Moving Arts Film Journal, onye nyocha Alison Frank weere Africa Paradis dị ka 'ihe na-atọ ụtọ dị ka ihe ọchị' ma na-akpali echiche, mana o kwukwara na ihe nkiri ahụ 'dị ka ọ bụ ihe na-atọ ọchị' na-eme ka o sie ike itinye aka n'akụkọ ahụ
África Zamorano Sanz (amụrụ na 11 Jenụwarị 1998) bụ onye na-egwu mmiri na Spain
O sonyere na asọmpi medley nke ụmụ nwanyị nke mita 200 na 2016 Summer Olympics
O sonyere na medley nke ụmụ nwanyị nke mita 200, 200 mita azụ, na 4 × 100 mita medley relay na 2020 Summer Olympics na Tokyo, Japan
AllAfrica bụ ebe nrụọrụ weebụ nke na-achịkọta akụkọ Ndi e mepụtara na kọntinent Afrịka banyere akụkụ niile nke ndụ Afrịka, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nsogbu na ọdịbendị
Ọ dị na Bekee na French ma mepụta site na AllAfrica Global Media, nke nwere ọfịs na Cape Town, Dakar, Lagos, Monrovia, Nairobi na Washington, DC na Washington, DC
AllAfrica bụ onye nọchiri African News Service
Enwere ike igosi akụkọ ya site na ụdị na obere ụdị dịka mba, mpaghara, na akụkọ akụkọ
N'afọ 2008, AllAfrica wepụtara usoro bọọdụ nkọwa
Onye isi oche nke AllAfrica Global Media, Amadou Mahtar,, bụ onye otu International Advisory Board nke African
Àtụ News agencies

The African Academy of Languages (ACALAN; French Académie Africaine des Langues; Portuguese Academia Africana de Línguas or ACALIN) bụ òtù nzukọ Pan-African nke onye isi ala Mali n'oge ahụ bụ Alpha Oumar Konaré tọrọ ntọala na 2001 maka mbunyi na kwazi nkwalite asụsụ Africa
Na mbu e guzobere ya dị ka Mission for the African Academy of Languages (MACALAN)
Onye mbụ bu onye isi nke ACALAN bụ onye bụbu minista nke agụmakwụkwọ bụ isi nke Mali bụ Adama Samassekou
African Union kwupụtara na afọ 2006 bu afọ Asụsụ Africa ma guzobe African Academy of Languages, June 21 hụrụ mwepụta nke Board Governing nke ACALAN na Addis Ababa, Ethiopia
Kemgbe e kere ACALAN etinyela aka n'ọtụtụ ọrụ n'ofe Afrịka site na mmepe nke atlas nke asụsụ Africa ruo n'ịhazi na nhazi nke usoro ederede nke asụsụ ụgbọ ala gafere dị ka Fulfulde, Hausa na Mandenkan
Site na Disemba 2009 ruo August 2015, Prọfesọ Sozinho Francisco Matsinhe nke Mozambique duziri ACALAN
Lang Fafa Dampha nọchiri ya n'ihe nkiri ma malite na Jenụwarị 2019 na aha zuru ezu
E kewara ACALAN n'ime akụkụ isi ise na ọkwa mba dị iche iche, ha bụ
ACALAN dịkwa na ụlọ ọrụ National Language Structures (NLS) na steeti ọ bụla yana otu Asụsụ Vehicular Cross-Border maka asụsụ ya ọ bụla

AAF malitere ọrụ ndị a
African Banking Corporation bụ ụlọakụ mba Britain, ya bụ, o nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na London mana alaka ya niile dị na mba ofesi
N'ụzọ a na-adịghị ahụkebe, ọ bụ ụlọ akụ na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ (ya bụ, ụlọ akụ ndị ọzọ nwere ya), kama ịbụ nke ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ karịsịa na South Africa
N'afọ 1920, a zụrụ ụlọ akụ ahụ ma jikọta ya na Standard Bank nke South Africa

The African Centre of Excellence for Genomics of Infectious Diseases (ACEGID), nke dị na Mahadum Redeemer, Ede, Nigeria, bụ njikọ nke ụlọ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ na ahụike nke West Africa na-arụkọ ọrụ maka nyocha na ọzụzụ
E hiwere ACEGID na 2014, na ego mbụ maka mmemme ahụ sitere na World Bank
Ebumnuche nke mmemme a bụ ije ozi dị ka ebe kachasị mma maka nyocha na ọzụzụ na genomics, na-elekwasị anya na ọrịa na-efe efe
Prọfesọ Christian Happi bụ onye nduzi na onye isi nchọpụta nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

Ndị otu ahụ na Naịjirịa gụnyere Mahadum Redeemer, Ụlọ Ọgwụ Nkụzi Irrua Specialist, Irrua Edo State, Federal Medical Center, Owo, General Hospital Ikorodu, Lagos na Alex Ekueme Federal Teaching Hospital, Abakaliki
Ndị otu mpaghara gụnyere Kenema Government Hospital, Sierra Leone na Université Cheikh Anta Diop, Dakar (Senegal)

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụike ọha na eze nke mba, mpaghara na ụwa gụnyere Nigeria Center for Disease Control (NCDC), Africa Center for Diseasa Control na World Health Organization, Mahadum Harvard, Broad Institute of Harvard na Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Mahadim Tulane, The Scripps Institute, Walter Reed Army Institute of Research, Mahadamị Nebraska Medical Center na Mahadum Cambridge
Ndị mmekọ nke ụlọ ọrụ onwe gụnyere Viral Hemorrhagic Fever Consortium, Illumina, Dimagi, Zalgen LLC, Fathom Inc, Microsoft na Access Bank PLC, Lagos, Nigeria
ACEGID's Master of Science na Doctor of Philosophy degrees programs in Molecular Biology and Genomics na-arụ ọrụ na njikọ aka na Mahadum Redeemer's Department of Biological Sciences
Ihe omume ndị a bụ nke AQAS kwadoro

Nnyocha ACEGID na-elekwasị anya n'iji ngwá ọrụ na usoro dị elu nke genomics maka nyocha ọrịa na-efe efe, ịme nlekota, ịzụlite nchọpụta, ọgwụ na ọgwụ mgbochi ọrịa, yana inye ozi dị mkpa site na ụlọ ọrụ ahụike ọha na eze maka ime iwu dabere na ihe akaebe
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na ndị mmekọ na-arụkọ ọrụ iji mepụta nchọpụta ọrịa na-efe efe
Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ nyocha nke ACEGID gụnyere

Na mgbakwunye na ego nke World Bank nke e guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, ACEGID enwetala ego nyocha site n'aka òtù dị iche iche gụnyere United States National Institutes of Health, Human Heredity and Health in Africa (H3 Africa), Wellcome Trust, na United Kingdom Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council, ELMA Philanthropies, Skoll Foundation, yana Bill na Melinda Gates Foundation, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ihe ACEGID rụzuru gụnyere
Na mgbakwunye, ọrụ ACEGID enwetala ọtụtụ nkwado mba na nke mba ụwa

Edepụtara ha na ndepụta ngwaahịa nke Ghana Stock Exchange, GSE All-Share Index

African Charter on Human and Peoples' Rights (nke a makwaara dị ka Banjul Charter) bụ ngwá ọrụ ikike mmadụ zuru ụwa ọnụ nke e bu n'obi kwalite na chekwa ikike mmadụ na nnwere onwe ndị bụ isi na mpaghara Afrika

Ọ pụtara n'okpuru ngalaba nke Òtù Na-ahụ Maka Ịdị n'Otu Africa (ebe ọ bụ na African Union nọchiri anya ya) bụ nke, na 1979 Mgbakọ nke ndị isi obodo na ndị ọchịchị, nakweere mkpebi nke na-akpọ maka ịmepụta kọmitii nke ndị ọkachamara na-edepụta kọntinent gburugburu ngwá ọrụ ndị ruuru mmadụ, dị ka ndị dịbu adị na Europe (European Convention on Human Rights) na America (American Convention on Human Rights) E hiwere kọmitii a n'ụzọ kwesịrị ekwesị, o wepụtakwara akwụkwọ nke e ji otu olu kwadoo ná Mgbakọ nke 18 nke OAU nwere na June 1981, na Nairobi, Kenya

Dabere na Nkeji edemede 63 ya (nke ọ ga-abanye n'ọrụ ọnwa atọ mgbe odeakwụkwọ ukwu nabatara ngwá ọrụ nke nkwenye ma ọ bụ ịgbaso ọnụ ọgụgụ ka ukwuu' nke mba ndị otu OAU), Charter Africa on Human and Peoples' Rights malitere na 21 Ọktoba 1986 - iji kwanyere ya ùgwù 21 Ọkọba 'African Human Rights Day'

Nleba anya na nkọwa nke Charter bụ ọrụ nke African Commission on Human and People's 'Commission on November 2, 1987 na Addis Ababa, Ethiopia ma bụrụ isi ugbu a na Banjul, Gambia Emechara nakweere ụkpụrụ nke Charter na 1998 ebe a ga-esi mepụta Ụlọikpe Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ na Ndị mmadụ Usoro a malitere na 25 Jenụwarị 2004

Na Julaị 2004, Mgbakọ AU kpebiri na a ga-etinye ACHP n'Ụlọikpe Ikpe nke Africa Na Julaị 2005, Mgbakọ AU kpebiri na ACHP kwesịrị ịrụ ọrụ n'agbanyeghị na usoro iwu guzobere Ụlọikpe Ikpe Ikpe nke Africa amalitebeghị N'ihi nke a, nnọkọ nkịtị nke asatọ nke Council Executive Council of African Union na Khartoum, Sudan, na 22 Jenụarị 2006, họpụtara ndị ọka ikpe mbụ nke Ụlọikpe Afrịka na-ahụ maka ikike mmadụ na ndị mmadụ Mmekọrịta dị n'etiti Ụlọikpe ahụ emepụtara ọhụrụ na kọmitii ka a ka ga-ekpebi
Dịka nke afọ 2019, steeti iri ise na atọ akwadola Charter

Akwụkwọ akụkọ Afrịka gbasara ikike mmadụ na ndị mmadụ gụnyere okwu mmalite, akụkụ atọ, isi anọ, na isiokwu 63 Charter hibere usoro ikike mmadụ mpaghara maka Africa Charter na-ekekọrịta ọtụtụ atụmatụ na ngwa mpaghara ndị ọzọ, mana nwekwara njirimara pụrụiche pụtara ìhè gbasara ụkpụrụ ọ matara yana usoro nlekọta ya

Okwu mmalite ahụ na-etinye aka na mkpochapụ nke Zionism, nke o jiri tụnyere colonialism na apartheid, mere ka South Africa ruo eruo ịbanye na 1996 na ndoputa na Charter dabara na mkpebi UN ' gbasara njirimara nke Zionism

Charter na-amata ọtụtụ ihe ndị a na-ewere ikike obodo na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nabatara nke ụwa Ikike obodo na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a ghọtara na Charter gụnyere ikike nnwere onwe pụọ na ịkpa ókè (Nkeji 2 na 18(3)), nha anya (Nkeji 3), ndụ na iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe (Nkeji 4), ugwu (Nkeji 5), nnwere onwe pụọ n'ịbụ ohu (Nkeji edemede 5), nnwere onwe pụọ na mmeso ọjọọ, mmeso ọjọọ ma ọ bụ mmeso ọjọọ ma ọ bụ ntaramahụhụ (Nkeji 5), ikike maka usoro ziri ezi gbasara njide na njide (Nkeji 6), ikike ikpe ikpe ziri ezi (Nkeji 7 na 25), nnwere onwe okpukpe Nkeji edemede 8), nnwere onwe nke ozi na ikwu okwu (Nkeji 9), nnwere onwe mkpakọrịta (Nkeji 10), nnwere onwe ọgbakọ (Nkeji 11), nnwere onwe imegharị (nkeji 12), nnwere onwe itinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị (Nkeji 13), ikike ime ihe onwunwe (Ikeji 14), na ikike iguzogide (Ikeji 20)
Ụfọdụ ndị ọkà mmụta ruuru mmadụ tụlee mkpuchi Charter maka ikike obodo na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị ọzọ ezughị oke
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ikike nzuzo ma ọ bụ ikike megide ọrụ mmanye ma ọ bụ iwu anaghị anabata ya n'ụzọ doro anya
A na-ewere ndokwa ndị metụtara ikpe ziri ezi na itinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ka ndị na-ezughị ezu site na ụkpụrụ mba ụwa

Charter na-amatakwa ụfọdụ ikike akụ na ụba, ọha na eze na omenala, na n'ozuzu Charter a na-ewere na ọ na-etinye aka na ikike ndị a Charter na-amata ikike ịrụ ọrụ (Nkeji 15), ikike inwe ahụike (Nkeji 16), na ikike mmụta (Ikeji 17) Site na mkpebi nke African Commission on Human and Peoples' Rights, SERAC v Nigeria (2001), a ghọtakwara na Charter na-agụnye ikike ịnweta ụlọ na ikike iri nri dịka 'nke doro anya' na Charter, karịsịa n'ihi ya ndokwa na ikike nke ndụ (Art
4), ikike ahụike (Art
16) na mmepe (Art

Na mgbakwunye na ịnakwere ikike onye a kpọtụrụ aha n'elu Charter na-amatakwa ikike mkpokọta ma ọ bụ otu, ma ọ bụ ikike ndị mmadụ na ikike mmadụ nke ọgbọ atọ Dịka Charter na-amata ikike otu n'ọkwa na-adabaghị na mpaghara European ma ọ bụ Inter-American ikike ikike mmadụ Charter nyere ikike nchekwa ezinụlọ site n'aka steeti (Nkeji edemede 18), ebe 'ndị mmadụ' nwere ikike ịha nhata (Nkeji 19), ikike ikpebiri onwe ya (nkebi nke 20), ịchụpụ akụ na ụba ha na ihe ndị sitere n'okike n'efu (nkeji edemede) 21), ikike mmepe (Nkeji 22), ikike udo na nchekwa (Nkeji 23) na 'n'ozuzu na-eju gburugburu ebe obibi' (Nkeji 24)
Charter abụghị naanị inye ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu na ndị mmadụ ikike, kamakwa ọ gụnyere ọrụ dịịrị ha Ọrụ ndị a dị na edemede 29 ma bụrụ ndị a

African Civil Aviation Commission (AFCAC; French Commission africaine de l'aviation civile, CAFAC) bụ ụlọ ọrụ nke African Union hiwere isi na Dakar Ebumnuche ya bụ ịzụlite na ịhazi ụgbọ elu obodo na Africa
AFCAC tọrọ ntọala dị ka ụlọ ọrụ pụrụ iche nke Òtù Na-ahụ Maka Ịdị n'Otu Africa na 17 Jenụarị 1969
Edere Mkpebi Yamoussoukro na 1999 wee bụrụ nke na-adịgide adịgide na 2002 AFCAC bụzi ụlọ ọrụ na-eme ihe n'ahịa nke Single African Air Transport Market, nke na-eme mkpebi Yamoussoukro
Mmekọrịta ya na International Civil Aviation Organisation gụnyere ịkwalite ngwa nke ụkpụrụ ICAO na omume akwadoro

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-enweta enyemaka nchịkwa na ego n'aka ICAO ma nwetakwa ego n'aka African Development Bank N'afọ 2015, ọtụtụ steeti akwụghị ụgwọ ndị otu ha na 90 % nke ego AFCAC na-eji na ụgwọ ọnwa na ụgwọ nhazi
African Distillers bụ ụlọ ọrụ dị na Zimbabwe
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta ihe ọṅụṅụ na-aba n'anya, ọkachasị mmanya na mmanya, na Zimbabwe
E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1944 dị ka 'P J Joubert Limited', ụlọ ọrụ mbubata mmanya wee zụta ebe a na-ere mmanya na Mutare na 1946 wee malite imepụta ihe ọṅụṅụ n'onwe ya
Na 1974, African Distillers kwagara isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Stapleford
E mere atụmatụ na 1989 na African Distillers na-emepụta ihe dị ka karama mmanya 3 nde kwa afọ, ụzọ atọ n'ụzọ anọ nke ngụkọta mmanya ụlọ nke mba ahụ
Mmepụta mmanya nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị na ubi vaịn Green Valley na Odzi
Na Zimbabwe, African Distillers na-edobe ebe nchekwa isii, na Bulawayo, Harare, Kwekwe, Masvingo, Mutare na Victoria Falls
African Distillers na-arụ ọrụ ego atọ ma na-echekwa ụlọ ahịa, na Harare, Mutare na Bulawayo
Ngwaahịa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gụnyere
Akụrụngwa nke African Distillers depụtara na Zimbabwe Stock Exchange, ebe ọ na-azụ ahịa n'okpuru akara AFDS ma bụrụ akụkụ nke Zimbabwe Industrial Index
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Machị afọ , ndị nwere òkè kachasị ukwuu na ngwaahịa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ka egosiri na tebụl dị n'okpuru ebe a

E mepụtara African Food Network iji kọwaa echiche ụwa banyere nri Africa, nri na nri ọdịnala nke onye guzobere ya kwuru
African Governance Architecture (AGA) bụ usoro maka mkparịta ụka n'etiti ndị nwere mmasị na ha bụ ndị e nyere iwu ịkwalite ezi ọchịchị ma kwalite ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya n'Africa
N'akwụkwọ akpọrọ The African Union Law (Ed
Berger Levrault, 2014, p
29) Blaise Tchikaya guzobere njikọ dị n'etiti ikpo okwu a na-akpọ AGA na mmelite nke Iwu Mba Nile nke metụtara steeti Africa
AGA bụ otu akụkụ - ma eleghị anya nke kachasị mkpa - nke iwu ọchịchị mba ụwa na-adịbeghị anya
Ọzọkwa, ọ bụ onye isi na-eme ihe n'ịkwalite domestication na mmejuputa ebumnuche ndị edepụtara na nkwupụta iwu na iwu na African Union (AU) Shared Values
E guzobere na 2011 AGA dị na Addis Ababa, Ethiopia na isi ụlọ ọrụ AU na ndị otu AGA Platform nọ n'Afrịka
N'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2016, mba ndị otu kwadoro iwu nke usoro AGA n'oge African Union Summit
Nkwurịta okwu banyere 'Pan-African Architecture on Governance' malitere na 16th Ordinary Session nke African Assembly nke lekwasịrị anya na isiokwu nke Shared Values nke AU
E mere nnọkọ a na Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, na 2011 ma nabata iwu nke ga-eguzobe 'Pan-African Architecture on Governance'

Iji mee ka mkpebi nke Nzukọ ahụ dị na Ntọala nke Ọchịchị Pan-African, African Union Commission (AUC) guzobere African Governance Architecture (AGA) dị ka ikpo okwu na-akwalite mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ndị metụtara na-arụ ọrụ n'ịkwalite ezi ọchịchị na iwusi ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya ike n'Africa, na mgbakwunye na ịsụgharị ebumnuche nke nkwupụta iwu na iwu na ụkpụrụ ndị a na-ekerịta na AU (lee n'okpuru maka ozi ndị ọzọ)
N'ihi na afọ 2012 bụ afọ nke AU Shared Values, a kpaliri akwụkwọ ikike dị iche iche nke AU ịghọ onye nduzi dị mkpa maka ọrụ ndị otu na ndị otu African Union
N'ihi ya, e tinyere Charter for African for Democracy, Elections and Governance (ACDEG), akwụkwọ dị mkpa na-akọwa ọrụ nke AGA, n'ọrụ mgbe a nabatara ya na 2007
A na-ahazi AGA gburugburu usoro iwu nke African Union Shared Values guzobere
AGA dabeere na ebumnuche na ụkpụrụ ndị akọwapụtara na ngwaọrụ dị iche iche nke AU Shared Values nke mba ndị otu AU bịanyere aka na ya ma si otú a kwado ya, gụnyere ma ọ bụghị nanị na ndị a
Ụlọ Ọrụ Ọchịchị Afrịka (APF) bụ usoro nchịkọta akụ nke AGA e mere iji kwado atụmatụ na mmemme nke Platform Members nke na-akwalite ezi ọchịchị na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na kọntinent ahụ

Ebumnuche ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ ịkwalite ike ụlọ ọrụ ike na iwu ụlọ; mkparita uka iji kwado ntinye aka nwa amaala na usoro ochichi onye kwuo uche ya; nkwado teknụzụ nye mba ndị otu kwupụta nkwenye, ime ụlọ, mmejuputa iwu na ịkọ akụkọ na ngwa AU Shared Values; na mgbochi diplomacy, post esemokwu nwughari na ￼￼Eme udo ￼ atumatu '

The African Journal of Traditional, Complementary and Alternative Medicines bụ akwụkwọ ahụike na-emeghe ohere nke ndị ọgbọ na-enyocha na-ekpuchi nyocha banyere osisi ọgwụ, ọgwụ ọdịnala, ọgwụ ọzọ, na nri na teknụzụ ọrụ ugbo
A na-etinye ya na ndepụta Jeffrey Beall nke 'akwụkwọ akụkọ nwere ike, nke nwere ike, ma ọ bụ nke nwere ike ịbụ na ọ bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na-emeghe'
A na-ewepụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ma tinye ya na

Akwụkwọ akụkọ Africa dị n'ịntanetị ( AJOL ) bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-anaghị akwụ ụgwọ na South Africa raara onwe ya nye iji kwalite visibiliti n'ịntanetị na ịnweta nyocha ndị ọkà mmụta bipụtara nke ndị ọkà mmụta dabeere na Afrịka
Isi ụlọ ọrụ a dị na Grahamstown
Site n'iji ịntanetị dị ka ọnụ ụzọ ámá, AJOL na-achọ ịkwalite ọnọdụ maka ịsụgharị asụsụ Afrịka na mmepe Afrika
N'ime mba 50 n'ụwa nile nke Òtù Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu ekewapụtara dị ka mba ndị kacha nta emepe emepe bu Mba ndị kacha emepe emepe (LDCs), 33 nọ n'Africa
Enwere mmata zuru oke maka mkpa agụmakwụkwọ dị n'ịkwado ịda ogbenye n'ime ogologo oge, na-etinyekarị aka na agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị
Nleba anya n'otu oge na agụmakwụkwọ ka elu na kọntinent ahụ dịkwa mkpa maka mba Africa ka ha na-azụlite ikike na akụ na ụba ha na-aga n'ihu ma bulite mpaghara ahụ n'enweghị mmepe
Ebumnuche AJOL bụ ịkwado nyocha ndị Africa na imegide ahaghị nhata nke 'North-South' na 'West-East' site n'ịkwado mmata na ịnweta nyocha e bipụtara n'Africa
Ozi sitere na mba ndị mepere emepe abaghị uru ma ọ bụ dabara maka Africa dịka nke sitere na kọntinent ahụ
AJOL na-enye ntanetị maka nchịkọta akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọkà mmụta na-ebipụta na Africa ma na-enye ohere zuru ụwa ọnụ na nhụta nke mmepụta nyocha nke Afrịka

N'ihi ya, ndị mbụ na-erite uru AJOL bụ ndị ọkà mmụta, nyocha ndị ọgbọ, akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị Africa bipụtara, na nke abụọ (nakwa kpọmkwem) ndị ga-erite uru bụ ndị Africa na mba ụwa nke obodo ndị ọkà mmụta chọrọ ịnweta nyocha nke Africa bipụtara
Weebụsaịtị AJOL na-enweta ihe karịrị 100,000 nleta kwa ọnwa site na mba 190 gbara ụwa gburugburu
Ọ bụ International Network nke Availability nke Scientific Publications (INASP) malitere ọrụ AJOL na 1998, otu ọrụ ebere nke dabeere na Oxford, na United Kingdom
Mgbe nyocha ọma nke isi na mbido 2000, eweghachiri AJOL wee gbasaa ya
Site na INASP, AJOL hiwere mmekorita ya na Public Knowledge Project (PKP) gbasara ngwanrọ mepere emepe nke na-akwado ọrụ ịntanetị AJOL
N'ịgbaso mkpa a nwapụtara maka ụdị AJOL na mba ndị ka na-emepe emepe, INASP na-eguzobe 'JOL' ndị yiri nke ahụ na Bangladesh, Vietnam na Nepal

AJOL na-akwado ugbu a site na Ford Foundation ma sitekwa na INASP 's Programme for the Enhancement of Research Information, site na Royal Danish Ministry nke Foreign Affairs (RDMFA), Sida, UK Department for International Development ( DFID ) na Norwegian Agency for Development Cooperation (Norad)
African Journals Online na-esonyekwa na ọnụ ụzọ sayensị zuru ụwa ọnụ nke WorldWideScience
Ụfọdụ n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ AJOL kwadoro bụ
AJOL na-akwadokwa ebe nchekwa nke ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ kwụsịrị
African Junior Chess Championship bụ asọmpi chess kwa afọ nke a na-emeghe maka ndị egwuregwu nọ n'Afrịka na-erubeghị afọ 20
Emere asọmpi ahụ na 1980, ma kemgbe mbipụta ya nke abụọ na 1989, a na-eme ya kwa afọ ma e wezụga na 2010
Malite n'afọ 2002, a na-eme asọmpi dị iche iche maka ụmụ agbọghọ n'otu oge ahụ na asọmpi ahụ
Ndị na-ahazi asọmpi ahụ bụ ndị otu mba jikọtara ya na African Chess Confederation
Ha na-emeghe maka ndị egwuregwu chess na-erubeghị afọ 20 ka ọ na-erule 1 Jenụwarị nke afọ a na-eme asọmpi ahụ
A na-ahazi asọmpi ahụ dị ka asọmpi gburugburu ma ọ bụ asọmpi usoro Switzerland dabere na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị sonyere
Kemgbe afọ 2001, asọmpi ahụ bụ nke itoolu na Switzerland
Ndị mmeri nke mmeghe na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na-enweta ikike isonye na asọmpi World Junior Chess nke afọ na-esote
N'asọmpi mmeghe, ndị egwuregwu atọ kachasị elu mgbe tiebreaks niile na-enweta aha Master nke mba ụwa, ebe onye ọkpụkpọ mbụ na-enwetakwa ụkpụrụ maka aha Grandmaster
Na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị, ndị egwuregwu atọ kachasị elu mgbe tiebreaks niile na-enweta aha Woman International Master, ebe onye ọkpụkpọ mbụ na-enwetakwa aha ọma maka aha Woman Grandmaster
A na-ewere nsonaazụ site na Olimpbase ọ gwụla ma egosiri ya n'ụzọ ọzọ

The African Leadership Academy (ALA) bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ dị na mpụga Johannesburg, South Africa, maka ụmụ akwụkwọ nọ n'agbata afọ 16 ruo 19, yana ndị okenye nọ ugbu a sitere na mba 46

Tọrọ ntọala na 2004 site n'aka Fred Swaniker, Chris Bradford, Peter Mombaur, na Acha Leke, ALA mepere eze na Septemba 2008 yana klas izizi nke ụmụ akwụkwọ 97 ALA na-achọ ịgbanwe Africa site n'ịchọpụta, ịzụlite, na ijikọ ọgbọ na-esote ndị isi Africa Iji mezuo ebumnuche a, ALA na-akụzi usoro ọmụmụ afọ abụọ na ọmụmụ ihe Africa, ide na nkwuputa okwu na onye ndu ọchụnta ego, yana isi ihe ọmụmụ a
Ndị malitere ALA, gburugburu 2004 weputara Global Leadership Adventures, mmemme okpomọkụ nke ga-abụ ihe mbido ALA

NNa 2006, a ghọtara Swaniker na Bradford, site na Echoing Green, onye kọwara ha dị ka abụọ n'ime ndị ọchụnta ego ọha na eze 15 kachasị mma n'ụwa N'afọ 2007 ka akwadoro ụlọ akwụkwọ mbụ, na Christopher Khaemba mara ọkwa dị ka onye isi mmalite nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ebe onye isi ugbu a bụ Hatim Eltayeb

Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ dị na Honeydew, na mpụga Johannesburg Ụmụ akwụkwọ na-ekekọrịta ọnụ ụlọ, ma enwere akụrụngwa ọgbara ọhụrụ gụnyere ogige egwuregwu, ọnụ ụlọ oche 350, ụlọ akwụkwọ na ebe iri nri N'afọ 2014, a malitere ịrụ ụlọ n'ụlọ obibi ọhụrụ nke ga-eme ka ALA mụbaa ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ ruo 120 na 2016

Ụlọ akwụkwọ nchịkwa nke Africa na-enweta ọtụtụ puku ngwa n'oge agba nke mbụ, ebe a na-ahọrọ ihe dịka 400 ka ha gaa mmemme ikpeazụ nke a na-eme n'ofe kọntinent ahụ Ndị ikpeazụ wee dee ule mbata, sonye na mmemme otu ma gbaa ajụjụ ọnụ ka a ga-ahọpụta ụmụ akwụkwọ 120 ka ha gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ A na-emecha ọkwa nnabata n'etiti ọnwa Eprel
Ụlọ akwụkwọ nchịkwa nke Africa na-eji usoro ise maka nnabata (African Leadership Academy)
Isi agụmakwụkwọ na-ejikọta mmemme tupu mahadum afọ abụọ dabere na ọkwa Cambridge A na usoro ọmụmụ pụrụ iche nke ALA na ndu azụmaahịa, ọmụmụ Africa na edemede na okwu  Ọkwa

Usoro nkuzi ndu azụmaahịa izizi nke ALA bụ isi nkuku nke ahụmịhe nwata akwụkwọ na-ewepụta ohere iji na-edu ndú na nka ọchụnta ego site na ịme anwansị na mmụta dabere na oru ngo A na-agba ụmụ akwụkwọ ume ka ha rụọ ọrụ n'ịwulite otu na echiche mbụ N'ime usoro ọmụmụ ihe ọmụmụ Africa interdisciplinary, ụmụ akwụkwọ na-amụ mkpochapụ agụụ, inye nlekọta ahụike, uto akụ na ụba, na mkpebi esemokwu
Onye isi oche Christopher Situma Khaemba bụbu onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Alliance na mpụga Nairobi, Kenya Khaemba nwetara MBA ya na Mahadum Kenyatta dị na Nairobi
Onye isi ugbu a bụ Hatim Eltayeb

Ndị otu ngalaba na-aga usoro nke gụnyere ọtụtụ ajụjụ ọnụ, nyocha ndabere agụmakwụkwọ, na nkwenye nke nrụtụ aka onwe onye na nke ndị ọkachamara Mgbe agba ajụjụ ọnụ nke mbụ gasịrị, onye nkuzi na-atụ anya na-eduzi nkuzi mkparị n'ihu ụmụ akwụkwọ na ndị otu ngalaba abụọ Nke a na-esote agba ajụjụ ọnụ ikpeazụ
Ndị nkuzi niile bụ ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum ma kụzieburu ụzọ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị isii
Ụmụ akwụkwọ na-ekere òkè na klọb dị iche iche, a na-atụkwa anya na nwa akwụkwọ ọ bụla ga-emepụta ma ọ bụ na-agba ọsọ ma ọ bụ 'Student Enterprise,' 'Echiche mbụ maka mmepe,' ma ọ bụ 'Ọrụ Ọrụ Obodo'
Azụmahịa ụmụ akwụkwọ na-arụ na-arụ ọrụ naanị na kampos, ma gụnye
Original Ideas for Development (OIDs), bụ ọrụ nwere oke oke ma na-agafe oge ụmụ akwụkwọ na ALA OID dị ugbu a gụnyere
African Monetary Union (AMU) bụ atụmatụ ịmepụta njikọ akụ na ụba na ego maka mba ndị dị na African Union, nke African Central Bank na-achịkwa
Njikọ dị otú ahụ ga-akpọ maka ịmepụta ego ọhụrụ dị n'otu, nke yiri euro; a na-akpọ ego a na-eche n'echiche mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka afro ma ọ bụ afriq
Otu mkpụrụ ego Africa ga-abụ nkeji ego mejupụtara mpaghara ego nchekwa ego mpaghara mpaghara bụ nke mebere ụdị ego mba dị iche iche
Nkwekọrịta Abuja, nkwekọrịta mba ụwa nke a bịanyere aka na June 3, 1991, na Abuja, Nigeria, mepụtara African Economic Community, ma kpọọ maka African Central Bank ka ọ gaa n'ihu na 2028
As of 2019[update] afọ 2019, atụmatụ ahụ bụ iguzobe otu African Economic Community na otu ego site na afọ 2023
Enwere otu ego mpaghara mpaghara abụọ dị na Africa, na-eji franc West African CFA, yana Central African CFA franc, n'otu n'otu
Na mgbakwunye, Mpaghara Monetary Common jikọtara ọtụtụ mba na South Africa dabere na rand South Africa
African Union maka njikọta ọzọ na-agba ume mmeAtụmatụpe nke njikọ mpaghara ndị ọzọ dị ka nzọụkwụ dị n'etiti maka njikọ ego zuru oke
Otu njikọ a na-atụ aro bụ eco, ego a na-enye ndị otu Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS)
N'afọ 2002, Mansour Ciss na Baruch Gottlieb mepụtara ego 'prototype', nke a na-akpọ AFRO, nke ha gosipụtara na Dakar Biennale of Contemporary African Art na May 10
Ọ bụ Dr
Prọfesọ Boamh mere ya
Ọrụ a bụ nzaghachi nye enweghị nnwere onwe mepụtara site na iji CFA franc
E mepụtara ndetu na mkpụrụ ego nke ego a na-eche n'echiche, ma nyefee ma ọ bụ ree ya ndị obodo Dakar na Senegal iji gbaa ha ume 'ịtụgharị uche n'ihe (uru) ego pụtara na ọdịnihu nke ego obodo ha'
Na 2015, Anthony Maruping kwuru na Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania, Rwanda na Burundi kpebisiri ike ịbanye n'otu ego n'ime afọ iri na-abịa
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ bụ naanị atọ n'ime mba 53 so na African Union na 2009 ka ha kpebisiri ike iji ego ahụ (na 2022, African Union nwere ndị otu 55)
Ijipt, Eswatini, na Lesotho edebanyela aha ha n'oge a kapịrị ọnụ nke njikọ ego ma rịọ ka a gbuo oge afọ abụọ ruo atọ
Seychelles nwere ike ọ gaghị esonye n'ihi egwu akụ na ụba ma nwee ike, tinyere Cape Verde, ịnwa isonye na euro n'oge na-adịghị anya, ebe ego Mayotte bụ euro
African Central Bank (ACB) bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ego atọ nke African Union
Ọ ga-ewere ọrụ nke African Monetary Fund ka oge na-aga
E kwekọrịtara na mbụ ka e mepụtara ACB, nke a ga-emecha n'afọ 2028, na 1991 Abuja Treaty
Nkwupụta Sirte nke 1999 kpọrọ oku ka usoro a dị ngwa, na okike site na 2020

Mgbe etinyere ya nke ọma site na iwu Pan-African nzuko omeiwu, ACB ga-abụ naanị onye na-enye otu ego Africa (African Monetary Union/Afro), ga-abụ onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ nke gọọmentị Africa, ga-abụ onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ na ụlọ akụ nke Africa na nzuzo
Ụlọ ọrụ, ga-ahazi ma na-elekọta ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ nke Africa, ma ga-edozi ọmụrụ nwa na ọnụego mgbanwe na njikọ nke gọọmentị Africa
Usoro iheomume dị ugbu a nke Nkwekọrịta Abuja guzobere na-akpọ maka otu ego Afrịka ka African Central Bank guzobe ya site na 2028
[citation needed] Ọ bụ ezie na mba ụfọdụ nwere nchedo banyere njikọ akụ na ụba na ego zuru oke, ọtụtụ njikọ ego mpaghara adịlarị, na ndị ọzọ na-eme atụmatụ
Ndị bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ahụ bụ ndị niile so na Òtù Na-ahụ Maka Ịdị n'Otu Africa (onye bu ya ụzọ AU) n'oge ahụ (Eritrea, South Africa, South Sudan na Morocco abanyela na ya)

African Queens bụ usoro docudrama nke 2023 na-elekwasị anya na ndị eze nwanyị, na-egosi na ọrụ Netflix
Ọ bụ Jada Pinkett Smith mepụtara ma kọọ usoro ahụ ma gosipụta ihe ngosi akụkọ ifo na ajụjụ ọnụ na ndị ọkachamara
Oge mbụ na-ekpuchi Njinga, Queen of Ndongo na Matamba, ọ bụkwa Ethosheia Hylton duziri ya
Oge nke abụọ na-elekwasị anya na Eze Nwanyị nke Alaeze Ptolemaic nke Ijipt, Fero Cleopatra VII Philopator, ọ bụkwa Tina Gharavi duziri ya
Usoro ihe nkiri docu-drama na-ejikọta ntụrụndụ dị egwu na ajụjụ ọnụ na ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na ndị mmadụ si n'ógbè nke oge a nke Eze Nwanyị chịrị
Onye na-emepụta Jada Pinkett Smith kwuru na enweghị akụkọ na-ekpuchi ndị eze nwanyị ojii dị ka ihe mkpali ya maka iduzi usoro ahụ

O kwuru, sị 'Anyị anaghị ahụkarị ma ọ bụ nụ akụkọ banyere ndị eze nwanyị ojii, nke ahụ dịkwa ezigbo mkpa nye m, yana nwa m nwanyị, na naanị maka obodo m iji nwee ike ịmara akụkọ ndị ahụ n'ihi na e nwere ọtụtụ n'ime ha
Maka oge mbụ, a na-enyocha ndụ Njinga, Queen of Ndongo na Matamba

Ndị a gbara ajụjụ ọnụ gụnyere Kellie Carter Jackson, osote prọfesọ nke Wellesley College na Ngalaba nke Africana Studies; Diambi Kabatusuila, Eze Nwanyị ọdịnala nke ndị Bakwa Luntu na Central Kasaï; na Rosa Cruz e Silva, onye bụbu onye nduzi nke National Archives of Angola
Oge nke abụọ na-enyocha ọchịchị Cleopatra, eze nwanyị nke Alaeze Ptolemaic nke Ijipt
A gbara Prọfesọ Shelley P
Haley ajụjụ ọnụ maka oge nke abụọ
Oge izizi malitere na Febụwarị 15, 2023
Oge nke abụọ malitere na Mee 10, 2023
Site na ntọhapụ nke oge ọ bụla, a tọhapụrụ ihe omume niile n'otu oge na Netflix
On the review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, 88% of 8 critics' reviews are positive, with an average rating of 73/10
Metacritic assigned African Queens Njinga a weighted average score of 69 out of 100, based on 5 critics, indicating 'generally favorable reviews'
Ellen E

Jones of The Guardian was critical of the first series, awarding it 2 out of 5 stars, saying that 'This tale of a 17th-century African female ruler features impressive academics, but they're drowned out by poor-quality dramatic sequences
Richard Roeper of the Chicago Sun-Times, however, praised the first series and gave it three out of four stars
Luke Peppa of the Financial Times cited Black Panther as a watershed for telling African stories, and that much of the stories of the continent have not been told
On the review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, 20% of 15 critics' reviews are positive, with an average rating of 46/10

The website's critics' consensus reads, 'Queen Cleopatra may posit some fresh speculation about the ubiquitous monarch, but its glossy presentation errs more towards a superficial toga party than a substantive endeavor' Metacritic assigned Queen Cleopatra a weighted average score of 45 out of 100, based on 5 critics, indicating 'mixed or average reviews'

Anita Singh of The Daily Telegraph gave it 2 out of 5 stars, saying, 'It's too soapy for serious history fans, and not enough of a soap for viewers who like juicy historical dramas' The Indian Express writer Rohan Naahar says that 'you don’t quite get an idea of who Cleopatra was as a person[] She’s projected, funnily enough, as a Beyonce-like figure' Naahar criticized the production design of the show, saying that Queen Cleopatra '[didn't] feature a single archive photograph of the palaces in which she lived, or of her many sculptures, or even paintings of her most famous conquests — both geographical and romantic'
Adele James mere Cleopatra na ihe nkiri nke abụọ
James bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Britain bụ onye ojii na ndị nna ya; ụcha akpụkpọ ahụ ya kpatara esemokwu banyere ngosipụta nke agbụrụ Cleopatra

CBS News gbara Monica Hanna ajụjụ ọnụ, onye Egyptologist, onye kwuru, 'M na-emegide ihe nkiri ahụ n'ihi na ọ na-akwalite atụmatụ Afrocentric, n'agbanyeghị eziokwu akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ma Cleopatra bụ Black ma ọ bụ White
' O jiri ya tụnyere òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Europe nke oge a, na-ekwu na ọ bụ 'Inapụta ihe ndị Ijipt oge ochie'
Gọọmentị Ijipt meghachiri omume na mkpebi ahụ n'ụzọ na-adịghị mma
Ministry of Antiquities nke Egypt kwuru na usoro ahụ na-anọchite anya 'ịgha ụgha nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Egypt'

Odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Kansụl Kasị Elu nke Archeology site na Ministry of Tourism and Antiquities nke Ijipt wepụtara nkwupụta banyere okwu ahụ, na-ekwu na 'Queen Cleopatra nwere akpụkpọ anụ na (nwere) ọdịdị ndị Gris

' Ha kwuru mkpụrụ ego, ihe oyiyi, na ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ nke Cleopatra dị ka ihe akaebe, na-agbakwụnye na mkpesa ya 'dị anya site na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ọ bụla, na-ekwusi ike na nkwanye ùgwù zuru oke maka mmepeanya Africa na ụmụnne anyị na kọntinent Afrịka nke na-eme ka anyị niile dịrị
Onye bụbu minista na-ahụ maka ihe ochie na onye Egyptologist Zahi Hawass katọrọ oge nke abụọ
O kwuru, 'Nke a bụ ụgha kpamkpam

Cleopatra bụ onye Gris Masedonia, nke pụtara na ọ nwere akpụkpọ anụ, ọ bụghị oji, na-agbakwụnye na 'Netflix na-anwa ịkpali mgbagwoju anya site na ịgbasa eziokwu ụgha na nke na-eduhie eduhie na mmalite nke mmepeanya Ijipt bụ oji

Nzaghachi ndị ọzọ sitere n'Ijipt gụnyere onye ọka iwu Ijipt nke gbara akwụkwọ iji gbochie Netflix na mba ahụ, na-ebo ebubo na Netflix na-akwalite Afrocentrism ma na-anwa ihichapụ akụkọ ihe mere eme Ijipt
Ụlọ ọrụ Egypt, al-Wathaeqya, kwupụtara na ọ na-emepụta ihe ngosi banyere ndụ 'ezi' Cleopatra na nzaghachi maka 'revisionism' nke usoro Netflix
Ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nkwurịta okwu mgbede na telivishọn Ijipt tụlere ma katọọ usoro ahụ
Onye nduzi Gharavi gbachitere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri, na-ekwu, 'N'ime nyocha ahụ, achọpụtara m ihe omume ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọ ga-abụ ịhụ Cleopatra nke onye na-eme egwuregwu ojii gosipụtara'

Ndị na-emepụta usoro ahụ kwuru na '[Cleopatra's] agbụrụ abụghị ihe Queen Cleopatra lekwasịrị anya, mana anyị kpachaara anya kpebie igosi ya nke agbụrụ ngwakọta iji gosipụta echiche banyere ndị nna nna Cleopatra nwere ike ịbụ ndị Ijipt na ọdịdị ọdịbendị dị iche iche nke Ijipt oge ochie

Adele James jụrụ izi ezi nke echiche nke 'blackwashing' ma kwupụta mmechuihu ya na echiche agbụrụ 'na ndị mmadụ na-akpọ onwe ha asị ma ọ bụ na-eyi egwu site na Blackness nke na ha chere na ọ dị mkpa ime nke ahụ, iji kewaa Ijipt na kọntinent ndị ọzọ'

James gara n'ihu na nzaghachi ya na podcast ya na Steph's Packed Lunch, na-ekwu na '[] Echere m na ọ bụ ihe na-enye nsogbu maka onye ọ bụla ịnata ọkwa mmetọ ọ bụla, ya fọdụkwa oke na ọdịdị nke ihe m natara, nke bụ n'ụzọ bụ isi ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, ihe niile

James kwupụtara nchegbu ya na ndị nkatọ mebiri agwa ahụ, na-asị 'Ọ bụrụ na ị na-ele ya anya ọ bụ obere akụkụ nke mkparịta ụka ahụ n'ezie, nke a bụ maka izu oke nke onye nwanyị a bụ na ọ bụ mmadụ na ekwesighi ibelata ya na agbụrụ ya karịa ka m kwesịrị ma ọ bụ onye ọ bụla kwesịrị'

African Union Conference Center and Office Complex (AUCC) bụ ụlọ dị na Addis Ababa, Ethiopia
Ọ bụ isi ụlọ ọrụ nke African Union ma bụrụkwa onye na-anabata nzukọ ndị AU na-eme ugboro abụọ n'afọ
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka ebe nnọkọ maka azụmaahịa ndị Afrịka na ndị ọzọ
Nnukwu ụlọ ahụ dị 999 m (328 ) n'ogologo ma ọ bụ ụlọ nke abụọ kachasị elu na Addis Ababa
Ọnụ ego ya bụ US $ 200 nde, ọ bụkwa gọọmentị China kwadoro ya
Emebere ma wuo isi ụlọ ahụ site na mmekorita nke Mahadum Tongji, China State Construction Engineering na China Architecture and Design Group, nke gọọmentị China nyere ego US $200 nde

Nhazi nke saịtị ahụ yiri aka abụọ na nnabata, na-egosipụta mmekọrịta Africa-China, ma gụnye ma nka ọdịnala Africa na akara ngosi pan-Africa nke oge a, yana ịdị elu nke 999 m (328 ft) nnukwu ụlọ elu na-ezo aka na Nkwekọrịta nke Sirte Declaration hiwere African Union na 9 Septemba 1999 Otú ọ dị, ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ihe eji ewu ụlọ ahụ bụ ndị China, a na-emepụta ihe osise dị na mgbidi na China
Ihe owuwu ahụ were afọ atọ na ndị ọrụ 1,200, ihe dịka ọkara n'ime ha bụ ndị Etiopia na ọkara n'ime ha bụ Ndị China
A raara ụlọ ahụ nye na 28 Jenụwarị 2012
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ụlọ ụlọ ọrụ dị okpukpu 20, nke nwere ngalaba nlekọta nke African Union Commission; ọnụ ụlọ zuru ezu nke mmadụ 2,505; na ụlọ ọgbakọ nke nwere ọnụ ụlọ ọgbakọ iri atọ na abụọ
Ma AUCC na Ụlọ Udo na Nchebe ka emebere ka ọ bụrụ enyi na gburugburu ebe obibi, na-eji ihe na-eme ka ọ dị jụụ na-achịkwa ihu igwe nke ụlọ na okpomọkụ nke Addis Ababa na-enweghị nnukwu ike

Ogige ahụ nwekwara ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ African Union Grand Hotel, nke onye Etiopia-Saudi billionaire Mohammed Hussein Al Amoudi kwadoro ma Westin na-elekọta ya, bụ nke bụ isi maka ndị isi na ndị nnọchiteanya na-anabata ndị isi n'oge mgbakọ AU
Huawei gọnahụrụ nkwupụta ọ bụla na-ekwesịghị ekwesị

Gọọmentị China gọnahụrụ na ha na-eme ihe n'ụlọ ahụ, na onye nnọchi anya China na AU, Kuang Weilin, na-akpọ isiokwu ahụ 'ihe nzuzu na ihe nzuzu' nakwa na ebubo ahụ bu n'obi itinye nrụgide n'etiti Beijing na kọntinent ahụ
Praịm Minista Etiopia bụ Hailemariam Desalegn kwuru na ya ekwenyeghị na akụkọ mgbasa ozi France
Moussa Faki Mahamat, onye isi nke African Union Commission, kwuru na ebubo ndị dị na akụkọ Le Monde bụ ụgha
'Ndị a bụ ebubo ụgha kpamkpam ma ekwere m na anyị na-eleghara ha anya kpamkpam'
Onye isi oche nke African Union Paul Kagame kwuru na ọ maghị ihe ọ bụla gbasara ya
N'ịgbaso ebubo ndị ahụ, African Union bịanyere aka na Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) ọzọ iji gbasaa mmekọrịta teknụzụ ha na Huawei na Febụwarị 2022
Àtụ African Union

Paspọtụ African Union bụ akwụkwọ paspọtụ a na-ahụkarị nke a na-etinye iji dochie paspọtụ steeti ndị otu African Union na-enye ma na-ewepụ ndị na-ebu visa ọ bụla maka steeti 55 niile dị n'AfricaỌ malitere na Julaị 17, 2016, na nnọkọ nkịtị nke iri abụọ na asaa nke African Union nke emere na Kigali na Rwanda site n'aka onye isi ala Rwanda Paul Kagame na onye isi ala Chad Idriss Deby nwụrụ anwụ
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2018, a na-eme atụmatụ ka a gbasaa paspọtụ ahụ ma dịrị njikere maka iji ya mee ihe n'ókèala ụwa site na 2020, agbanyeghị na a na-egbu oge ịmalite ya na 2021

Anne Ross Davidson, DA (3 Febụwarị 1937 na Glasgow 20 Disemba 2008 nà Aberdeen) bụ onye na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eme ìhè nkiri ná Scotland
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya na-ahụ anya n'ihu ọha na Scotland na mba ofesi
Anne Ross gụrụ akwụkwọ na Convent of the Sacred Heart School, Aberdeen
Ọ gara n'ihu na-amụ ihe ọkpụkpụ na Gray's School of Art, Aberdeen (1955), na-agụsị akwụkwọ n'elu klas ya na DA (ihe ọkpụkpụ)
Mgbé ọ zụchara ọzụzụ dị ka onye nkuzi nka, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nkụzi nka (1960-1968) na Gray's School of Art, alma mater ya
Ọ ga-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe ógè niile
Ọ laghachiri na Gray's iji kụzie ihe ọkpụkpụ n'ebe ahụ (1978ī82)
Ọkpụkpụ ya bụ African Woman and Child ka Edinburgh City Council nyere iwu iji gosipụta nguzo ANC megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ihe osise ahụ na-egosi nwanyị ojii na-eguzo na nwatakịrị n'ihu aro nke obere obodo
Onye otu African National Congress, Suganya Chetty, onye bi na Edinburgh n'oge ahụ, kpughere ya na 22 Julaị 1986
Ihe osise ya nke Robert the Bruce, nke Aberdeen City Council nyere iwu, na ngosi na Aberdeen Town House, na-egosi eze Scotland dị egwu na narị afọ nke iri na anọ na-ebu ọta na mma agha ya
Davidson jiri ihe ndị a na-ahụ anya mee ihe n'ịmepụta ụdị mbụ iji mepụta ihe ịchọ mma ziri ezi a hụrụ na ihe ndị ikpeazụ
Ihe ndị ọzọ na-abụghị nke okpukpe gụnyere onye ọrụ Gordon Highlander maka Alick Buchanan-Smith Award, ihe oyiyi nke Mary, Queen of Scots na usoro ndị na-agba egwú

Ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ, Royal Mail, William Grant and Sons Ltd, Glenfiddich Distillery na Aberdeen City Council so n'òtù ndị ọzọ na ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu nyere Anne Ross Davidson ọrụ iji gosipụta onyinye nà ònyìnyé maka há
N'afọ 1993, Mario Conti, onye bụ Bishọp nke Aberdeen n'oge ahụ, nyere Davidson ọrụ ịmepụta obere ihe oyiyi nke St Margaret nke Scotland iji mee emume ncheta afọ 900 nke onye nsọ ahụ
Margaret lụrụ Eze Malcolm nke Atọ na narị afọ nke iri na otu ma ihe a tụrụ atụ na-anọchite anya Margaret na-ejide akwụkwọ mepere emepe ma jiri nwayọ na-eduga obere nwa agbọghọ n'aka
N'afọ 2003, n'oge ya na Pope John Paul II na-ege ntị, Tony Blair, onye bụ praịm minista UK n'oge ahụ, nyere ya otu n'ime ihe oyiyi 500 nke St Margaret nke Anne Davidson mepụtara
Ọrụ okpukpe ndị ọzọ dị mkpa o mepụtara bu
N'agbata afọ 1985 na afọ 1998, ya na di ya na-arụ ọrụ ihe osise a ma ama maka ndị ìsì, nke Aberdeen City Council kwadoro
Ọ kụziiri ụmụaka nka n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche n'Aberdeenshire
Ọ ka na-akụzi na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị atọ ruo mgbe ọrịa mere ya na Septemba 2008
Ọ nwụrụ ọnwa atọ ka e mesịrị, mgbe ọ dị afọ 71
Anne Davidson hapụrụ di ya, Jimmy Davidson (onye a ma ama na-ese ihe na onye na-ede ihe na Scotland), ụmụ ha anọ na ụmụ ụmụ anọ
Ọ bụ onye otu Royal British Society nke ụmụ nwanyị na-ese ihe, International Society of Christian Artists na Society of Catholic Artists
Ụlọ akụ Central Africa (ACB) bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ego ise mbụ na ụlọ ọrụ pụrụ iche nke African Union
Ka oge na-aga, ọ ga-eweghara ibu ọrụ nke Fund Monetary Africa

Mgbe emechara ya nke ọma, ACB ga-abụ naanị onye na-enye otu ego Africa ('Afro' ma ọ bụ 'Ariq') na/ma ọ bụ na-arụ ọrụ n'akụkụ ụlọ akụ nchekwa mpaghara Africa, ọ ga-abụ onye na-elekọta ụlọ akụ nke Gọọmenti Africa na/ma ọ bụ mpaghara otu, ọ ga-abụ onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ nkeonwe na nke ọha na eze n'akụkụ ụlọ akụ etiti mpaghara Africa, ọ ga-ahazi, nyocha na ilekọta ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ nke Africa na mmekọrịta ya na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ na mpaghara, ọ ga-edozi mmasị na mgbanwe gọọmentị
ọnụego nke nwere ike ma ọ bụ ghara ịdị na ya na ụlọ akụ etiti mpaghara; ha niile jikọtara ya na nchịkwa gọọmentị Afrịka

Otu ego Afrịka ga-agụnye ego nke mpaghara mpaghara etiti nke gụnyere ego mba (The Arab Maghreb Union (AMU) - Northern Afriq, Southern African Development Community (SADC) - Southern Afriq, Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) - Western Afriq ma ọ bụ ECO, East African Community (EAC), Eastern Afriq - Common Market for Eastern and Southern Africa (COMESA) - Central Afriq wdgỌpụpụ ọzọ
Africa Monetary Fund bụ ụlọ ọrụ ego African Union, ọ bụ ezie na ka oge na-aga, a ga-ebufe ọrụ ya na Central Bank nke Africa

Àtụ African Union
Uwe ndị Afrịka bụ akwa sitere n'ebe dị iche iche gafee kọntinent Afrịka
N'ofe Afrịka, e nwere ọtụtụ ụdị, usoro, usoro na-acha, na ebumnuche ịchọ mma na ọrụ
Uwe ndị a nwere ihe dị mkpa nke ọdịbendị ma nwee ihe dị mkpa dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke imewe Afrịka

Akwukwo Afrikaans edere edere edekọ na-ekweta ná iwu nkè bụ ihe eji egosi olu na-adịghị arụ ọrụ na pluperfect, nke n'ọnọdụ a kwekọrọ ná emere ya

Ìhè ahịrịokwu ahụ pụtara nwere ike ịgbanwe dabere na ngwaa enyemaka eji eme ihe (bụ / dị), dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọ na-egosi na emeela ihe ma ka dị taa, ebe ọ bụ ná ọ na-apụta ná emeela, mana e bibiri ma ọ bụ furu efu
Á na-ejikarị -ende (kom/komende), mà mgbe ụfọdụ ọ na-adịghị mma (wees/synde, hê/hebbende, n'ụl/sterwende, bly/blywende), ọ bụ ezie ná a na-ewere nkè a dị ka ihe ochie maka ngwaa ọrụ
Mgbe ụfọdụ enwere mgbanwe mkpụrụ okwu ná mgbọrọgwụ nkè na-emetụtaghị ịkpọpụta (maak/makende, weet/wetende)
Ngwaa wees pụrụ ichè nwere ụdị subjunctive, ọ bụ ezie ná a naghị eji ha eme ihe n'oge a sy bụ ụdị subjunsive ugbu a, ná ware bụ ụdị subjonctive gara aga
Áhà ná Afrikaans, dị kà ná Dutch nkè oge a, enweghị usoro mgbanwe, ma enweghị okike ụtọ asụsụ (n'adịghị ka Dutch nke oge ahụ)
Otú ọ dị, enwere ọdịiche n'etiti otu na ọtụtụ ụdị aha
Ìhè ngosi nkè ọtụtụ bụ nsonaazụ -e, mana ọtụtụ aha a na-ahụkarị na-emepụta ọtụtụ ha kama site na ịgbakwunye -s ikpeazụ
Ọtụtụ áha ndị á na-ahụkarị nwere ọnụọgụ dị iche iche
Enweghị ọdịiche dị ná grammatical case maka áhà, adjectives ná isiokwu
Otú ọ dị, adjectives nwere ike ịgbanwe mgbe ha bu aha ụzọ
Dị ka iwu n'ozuzu, a na-agbanwekarị adjectives polysyllabic mgbe ejiri ya dị ka adjectives attributive
Enwere ike ịgbanwe adjectives attributive monosyllabic ma ọ bụ na ọ gaghị agbanwe, dabere na ụdị akụkọ ihe mere eme nke adjective
Adjectives gbagọrọ agbagọ na-ejigide njedebe -e na maka ụfọdụ adjectives, a na-ejide ụdaume ikpeazụ nke okwu furu efu na ojiji njirimara
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, t ikpeazụ na-esote ụda //x/ / nke ehichapụrụ na predicative na-eji dị ka reg (cf
Dutch recht), a na-ejigide ya mgbe a gbanwere adjective (regte)
Ihe yiri nke ahụ na-emetụta apocope nke t mgbe //s// gasịrị
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, adjective vas na-aghọ nnukwu mgbe a gbanwere ya
N'aka nke ọzọ, adjec/t/ives na-agwụ na -d (nke a na-akpọ /t/) ma ọ bụ -g (nke a Na-akpọ //x//) na-esote ụdaume ogologo ma ọ bụ diphthong, na-efunahụ -d na -g mgbe a gbanwere ya
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, lee ụdị mgbanwe nke
N'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ pụrụ iche, mgbe syncope nkè intervocalic consonant, enwekwara apocope ọzọ nkè akara ntụgharị
Dịka ọmụmaatụ,
N'ikwu yá n'ozuzu, otú mgbanwe ọdịdị ahụ na-emetụta adjectives gbanwere na-emetụtakwa n'ịmepụta ọtụtụ aha
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọnụọgụ nkè ajụjụ (ajụjụ) bụ聊 (ajụjụ)
Ìhè fọdụrụ na ọdịiche dị n'okwu ahụ kà dị ná usoro nnọchiaha
Dịka ọmụmaatụ,
**Rịba ámá ná a na-eji hullie na zullie mee ihe kama zij (isiokwu, onye nke atọ) n'ọtụtụ olumba Dutch
Enweghị ọdịiche dị n'etiti ndị nnọchiaha dị ichè ichè
A na-enwekarị ọdịiche dị n'etiti ihe na nnọchiaha nwere mgbe ejiri ya tupu áhà
Dịka ọmụmaatụ,
Ìhè dị ichè ná iwu gara aga bụ ónyé nkè atọ bụ nwoke ma ọ bụ ónyé na-anọpụ iche, ebe Afrikaans na-eme kà ọdịiche dị n'etiti hom (ya) na sy (ya)

N'otu aka ahụ, a na-ekewapụta nnọchiaha na-adịghị ndụ dit (ya, isiokwu ma ọ bụ ihe) site ná sy (ya), a pụkwara iji okwu hy kọwaa ihe ndị na-adịghị adị ndụ n'otu ụzọ ahụ dị ka nwanyị na Bekee, dịka na Rooibaard hot sauce brand's slogan 化hy mooi rooizar ('Ọ na-ere uhie'), na-ezo aka na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ nkè ngwaahịa ya
Maka nnọchiaha nke atọ, ebe Hulle nwekwara ike ịpụta nke ha, a na-ejikarị hul dị iche iche eme ihe iji pụta 'ha' iji mee ka ọdịiche dị n'etiti ha ná ha / ha
N'otu aka ahụ, mgbe ị na-ekwu na ị nwere ụdị nnwere onwe jul
Afrikaans nwere usoro okwu siri ike, nkè akọwapụtara n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ederede South Africa site ná iji ihe a na-akpọ 'iwu STOMPI'
Áhà iwu ahụ na-egosi usoro nke akụkụ nkè ahịrịokwu kwesịrị ịpụta
Dị kà ọ dị ná Dutch ná German, infinitives ná participles gara aga na-apụta n'ọnọdụ ikpeazụ ná isi ahịrịokwu, kewara site na ngwaa enyemaka kwekọrọ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ,
Akụkụ ndị metụtara yá na-amalitekarị nà nnọchiaha 'wat', nkè á na-eji maka akụkọ onwe ónyé na nke na-abụghị nke onwe
Dịka ọmụmaatụ,

N'aka nkè ọzọ, ahịrịokwu ikwu nwere ike ịmalite site ná preposition + 'wie' mgbe ọ na-ezo aka na antecedent onwe onye, mà ọ bụ aglutination n'etiti 'waar' ná preposition mgbe ọ na'ezo aka ná precedent na-abụghị nkè onwe
Otú akụkụ pụrụ iche nke Afrikaans bụ ojiji ọ na-eji okpukpu abụọ na-adịghị mma
Dịka ọmụmaatụ,
A tụwo aro mmalite French ná San màkà ịgọnahụ okpukpu abụọ na Afrikaans
Ọ bụ ezie ná á ka na-ahụ mgbagha okpukpu abụọ n'asụsụ Low Franconian ná West-Flanders na ụfọdụ obodo nta 'nke dịpụrụ adịpụ' n'etiti Netherlands (ya bụ
Garderen), ọ na-ewere ụdị dị iche, nkè á na-adịghị ahụ na Afrikaans
Ìhè ndị a bụ ihe atụ
